articles.title: New horror movie remake based on divisive film gets terrifying trailer, and it might feature James McAvoy's most disturbing performance yet - Gamesradar
articles.description: Speak No Evil follows a holiday from hell
articles.content:
The first trailer for Speak No Evil is here, and it’s pretty chilling. Based on a 2022 Danish film of the same name, the new remake stars James McAvoy as a host from hell.
